message: “It starts by talking with somebody. It starts with listening. Nothing can compare to rescuing someone from the nastiest crime there is,” Lofy said. “You can do it in the occupation you’re in: Share what you know with someone else. I guarantee there are traffickers and trafficking victims where you are.”

data.description: Human trafficking enslaves children and adults, exploiting victims for forced sex as well as unpaid labor, not only in other countries and elsewhere in the U.S. but right here in
data.title: Human trafficking: Hidden in plain sight
